question: You are renting a flat from an agency. Your contract was for one year but you need to leave the flat two months early.Write a letter to the agency. In your letter•	introduce yourself•	ask to leave the flat before the contract finishes•	explain why you need to break the contract.
text: I am Mr Ravi from 205 unit who is living here for the last 10 months at Vistas apartment. I hope you remember me as we had a nice party  last weekend and I am sure that you may not forget my brand new car as you requested for a long ride at the upcoming weekend.

I am writing this letter with mixed emotions as I need to leave this city as part of my new job assignment. Therefore, I am planning to vacate my house before this month's end despite the current contract still being left with two more months yet to finish.

As you heard, I have got a promotion at my workplace hence, I need to travel to the United States of America to look after my whole new project which is extremely difficult to operate from here. In addition, my entire reporting team is there only and I need to make a move at any cost.
It would really great if you could consider this request as I am breaking the existing contract.
I look forward to hearing your response to this request .
